name: Kitty's Venture
description:
Join the kitty in a challenging fast-paced adventure to hunt for achievements. Kitty's Venture is a 2D side-scroller platformer game where you take control of a cute kitty. If you are a Steam achievement hunter, and love cats, then this is the game for you!

Kitty's Venture aims to deliver a challenging gameplay experience while rewarding the player with the cutest cat achievements on Steam. The only task of the player in this game is to JUMP. But the player has to be smart, and on point with the timing. The game has three different stages featuring a variety of obstacles. To unlock achievements, you have to collect Cat Points (CP), and coins. Some other in-game actions and events will also award you with achievements.

Features:
- Fast-paced gameplay that requires quick response
- Three different stages
- 80 unique achievements featuring cats
- Challenging gameplay requiring patience and precision
